reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: Investing in modern contraception will prevent unintended pregnancies and unsafe abortions thereby reducing maternal mortality and morbidity. Around the world women and girls suffer human rights abuses including gender-based violence early and forced marri age and female genital mutilation and are disproportionately affected by HIV/AIDS. In many countries young people are unaware of and unable to claim their sexual rights. Discriminatory laws and policies further limit their ability to exercise their SRHR.In response IPPF provides a range of quality integrated sexual and reproductive health (SRH) services information and comprehensive sexuality education (CSE) to empower individuals to exercise their rights. We advocate at global national and community levels : upholding SRHR and amplifying the voices of marginalised populations. IPPF is committed to ensuring universal access to SRHR promoting sustainable development advancing gender equality and to fighting against sexual and gender-based violence female genit al mutilation early child marriages. IPPF enables young people to take control of their lives by expanding access to quality CSE. Our impact is for women men and young people to be free to make informed choices about their sexuality health and well-being in a world without discrimination.IPPF?s ambitious Locally Owned Globally Connected Strategic Framework (2016-2022) unites the Federation and guides national MAs and civil society partners in formulating their own strategies. Core support from the Governm ent of Finland for the period 2019-2020 will accelerate IPPF?s progress in implementing its Strategic Framework (available in Annex 6). The four outcomes we will work towards by 2022 are:?100 governments will respect protect and fulfil sexual and reproduct ive rights and gender equality?One billion people will act freely on their sexual and reproductive health and rights?IPPF and our partners will deliver two billion quality integrated sexual and reproductive health services?IPPF will be a high-performing ac countable and united Federation.
